RunnerMetadata.description:
Metadata about the runner environment.

Captured at the start of each execution run to provide context
about the execution environment.
RunnerMetadata.title: RunnerMetadata

WorkflowMetadata.description:
Metadata about the workflow being executed.

Captured at the start of each execution run to provide context
about what automation is being run.

total_states.description: Total number of states in the workflow
total_states.title: Total States

total_transitions.description: Total number of transitions in the workflow
total_transitions.title: Total Transitions

initial_state_ids.description: Initial active states when workflow starts
initial_state_ids.title: Initial State Ids

WorkflowMetadata.title: WorkflowMetadata

MatchLocation.description:
Location of a pattern match on screen.

Used for both action input (where to click) and output (where element was found).
MatchLocation.title: MatchLocation

ScreenshotAnnotation.description:
Annotation overlay on a screenshot.

Used to highlight regions of interest, matches, or errors.
ScreenshotAnnotation.title: ScreenshotAnnotation

ExecutionStats.description:
Aggregate statistics for an execution run.

Calculated from individual action executions and updated
when a run is completed.
ExecutionStats.title: ExecutionStats

CoverageData.description:
Coverage statistics for an execution run.

Tracks how much of the workflow's states and transitions
were exercised during the run.

state_visit_counts.description: Map of state ID to visit count
state_visit_counts.title: State Visit Counts

transition_execution_counts.description: Map of transition ID to execution count
transition_execution_counts.title: Transition Execution Counts

CoverageData.title: CoverageData

ReliabilityStats.description:
Reliability statistics for a transition or action.

Used for analytics to identify flaky or problematic automations.

failure_modes.description: Breakdown of failure types and counts
failure_modes.title: Failure Modes

ReliabilityStats.title: ReliabilityStats

TransitionReliability.description:
Reliability statistics for a specific transition.

Extends ReliabilityStats with transition-specific context.

failure_modes.description: Breakdown of failure types and counts
failure_modes.title: Failure Modes

TransitionReliability.title: TransitionReliability

RunType.description:
Type of execution run.

Determines the behavior and reporting expectations for a run.

about the execution environment.

total_transitions.description: Total number of transitions in the workflow
total_transitions.title: Total Transitions

initial_state_ids.title: Initial State Ids

ExecutionRunCreate.description:
Request schema for creating a new execution run.

Sent by the runner at the start of an execution session.

workflow_metadata.description: Information about the workflow being executed

ExecutionRunCreate.title: ExecutionRunCreate

RunStatus.description:
Status of an execution run.

Lifecycle: PENDING -> RUNNING -> (COMPLETED | FAILED | TIMEOUT | CANCELLED)
PAUSED is a special state that can transition back to RUNNING.
RunStatus.title: RunStatus

RunType.description:
Type of execution run.

Determines the behavior and reporting expectations for a run.
RunType.title: RunType

ExecutionRunResponse.description:
Response schema for execution run creation and retrieval.

Returned after creating a run or when listing runs.
ExecutionRunResponse.title: ExecutionRunResponse

were exercised during the run.

transition_execution_counts.title: Transition Execution Counts

ActionStatus.description:
Status of an individual action execution.

SUCCESS/FAILED/TIMEOUT are terminal states.
PENDING is initial, RUNNING is transient (for long actions).
SKIPPED means action was intentionally not executed.
ERROR indicates an unexpected error during execution.
ActionStatus.title: ActionStatus

ActionType.description:
Type of action executed during automation.

These correspond to the action types in the Qontinui automation system.
ActionType.title: ActionType

ErrorType.description:
Type of error that occurred during execution.

Used for categorizing failures for analytics and debugging.
ErrorType.title: ErrorType

MatchLocation.description:
Location of a pattern match on screen.

Used for both action input (where to click) and output (where element was found).
MatchLocation.title: MatchLocation

IssueSeverity.description:
Severity level of an execution issue.

CRITICAL: Blocks functionality, immediate attention required.
HIGH: Major issue, should be fixed soon.
MEDIUM: Moderate issue, should be fixed.
LOW: Minor issue, fix when convenient.
INFORMATIONAL: FYI, no action required.
IssueSeverity.title: IssueSeverity

IssueType.description: Type of issue detected during execution.
IssueType.title: IssueType

ExecutionIssueCreate.description:
Schema for reporting an execution issue.

Sent by the runner when an issue is detected during execution.
ExecutionIssueCreate.title: ExecutionIssueCreate

NodeMetadata.description:
Metadata for a tree node.

Contains action configuration, runtime data, state context, and timing.
All fields are optional as different node types populate different fields.

is_expandable.description: Whether this action can have child nodes
is_expandable.title: Is Expandable

is_inline.description: Whether this action is displayed inline
is_inline.title: Is Inline

NodeMetadata.title: NodeMetadata

NodeStatus.description: Execution status of a tree node.
NodeStatus.title: NodeStatus

NodeType.description: Types of nodes in the execution tree.
NodeType.title: NodeType

PathElement.description: Element in a tree path (for breadcrumb navigation).

id.description: Unique identifier for this path element
id.title: Id

PathElement.title: PathElement

RuntimeData.description:
Runtime execution data captured during action execution.

Different fields are populated depending on the action type.
RuntimeData.title: RuntimeData

StateContext.description:
State machine context for an event.

Captures the state of the system before and after an action.
StateContext.title: StateContext

TimingInfo.description: Precise timing information for an event.
TimingInfo.title: TimingInfo

TopMatch.description: A single match result with confidence and location.
TopMatch.title: TopMatch

TreeEventType.description: Types of tree events emitted during execution.
TreeEventType.title: TreeEventType

TreeNode.description:

Represents a single workflow, action, or transition in the execution hierarchy.

parent_id.description: ID of parent node, null for root
parent_id.title: Parent Id
